input: goal: what is a nonstick pan used for? [SEP] solution 1to melt almond butter for mac and cheese sauce. [SEP] solution 2to perfectly fry eggs, and nothing else.
goal: Deter spiders from breeding in garden. [SEP] solution 1Spread orange peels around garden. [SEP] solution 2Spread banana peels around garden.
goal: netting [SEP] solution 1can catch butterflies from the woods [SEP] solution 2can catch fish from the woods

goal: How does one get a piece of clothing to dry really quickly with a dryer. [SEP] solution 1Hang the item up and take a paint brush and move along it, without burning it by getting it too close. [SEP] solution 2Hang the item up and take a hair dryer and move along it, without burning it by getting it too close.

goal: To cook crusts without filling them to ensure they retain their shape, you can [SEP] solution 1Place refried beans into the crust so that you can remove them later [SEP] solution 2Place dried beans into the crust so that you can remove them later
goal: what do you use to play kick ball? [SEP] solution 1A rubber ball. [SEP] solution 2A bowling ball.

goal: How do you re-purpose old shirts? [SEP] solution 1Cut out all the logos with scissors and have them sewn into a quilt. [SEP] solution 2Cut out all the logos with scissors and glue them to the wall.

goal: How do you screw in a screw? [SEP] solution 1Place the screw's pointy end into the appropriate hole. Use the pointy end of a screwdriver and place that into the back of the screw, so that it fits in the grooves. Twist the screwdriver counter-clockwise, so that it's moving the screw counter-clockwise and into the hole. Finish when the screw won't move any more. [SEP] solution 2Place the screw's pointy end into the appropriate hole. Use the pointy end of a screwdriver and place that into the back of the screw, so that it fits in the grooves. Twist the screwdriver clockwise, so that it's moving the screw clockwise and into the hole. Finish when the screw won't move any more.

goal: How do you get yellow stains out of clothing? [SEP] solution 1Mix 4 tablespoons of flour with a quarter cup of water and scrub into the stain. Let the mixture sit on the stain for about an hour. Wash the piece of clothing in cold water, once complete check to see if the stain is removed, if not repeat before drying. [SEP] solution 2Mix 4 tablespoons of baking soda with a quarter cup of water and scrub into the stain. Let the mixture sit on the stain for about an hour. Wash the piece of clothing in cold water, once complete check to see if the stain is removed, if not repeat before drying.
goal: rubber band [SEP] solution 1can help grasp vise grip handles [SEP] solution 2can operate vise grip easily
goal: whiteboard [SEP] solution 1falls from ship  [SEP] solution 2falls from wall

goal: How to prepare wood before repainting. [SEP] solution 1Apply primer directly to the old finish and paint over the top. [SEP] solution 2Use a sander with 240-grit sandpaper to remove any old finish and paint.

goal: How do you roast broccoli? [SEP] solution 1Roasting the veggie with a little olive oil, salt and pepper for 20 – 25 minutes in the oven. Then top it with lemon juice, pine nuts and parmesan. The broccoli will come out crunchy and delectable! [SEP] solution 2Roasting the veggie with a little peanut oil, salt and pepper for 20 – 25 minutes in the oven. Then top it with lemon juice, pine nuts and parmesan. The broccoli will come out crunchy and delectable!

goal: How to start a conversation at a party where you don't know anyone? [SEP] solution 1You can say something to open a neutral yet friendly starter, such as "Isn't this a rotten apartment/room/house/yard " etc. or "Have you tried the yucky lasagne/cookies/tuna rolls" ? From there, if the person cannot respond to you, move on to someone else. [SEP] solution 2You can say something to open a neutral yet friendly starter, such as "Isn't this a great apartment/room/house/yard " etc. or "Have you tried the lasagne/cookies/tuna rolls" ? From there, if the person cannot respond to you, move on to someone else.
goal: Make vintage plant pots. [SEP] solution 1Add holes to the bottom of empty vegetable plastic containers. [SEP] solution 2Add holes to the bottom of empty vegetable oil tins.

goal: To blow up a balloon, you can [SEP] solution 1Place the balloon between your nostrils and blow hard until inflated [SEP] solution 2Place the balloon between your lips and blow hard until inflated
